ComicInfo.Title: Part 5 of 5
ComicInfo.Summary:
Deadpool is finally proven innocent, and everyone knows it. But now it's personal for the Merc with a Mouth. Having been battered, stabbed, and broken, Deadpool is jonesing for payback. And the only thing that can scratch that itch is bringing down Tombstone. Unfortunately, the only person who can protect him is the Hood…but will he?
*Notes:* The cover is a homage of the cover of The Spectacular Spider-Man #206.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-08-04 22:37:48. [CVDB167376]
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Jody LeHeup, Joe Quesada
ComicInfo.Characters: Bulldozer, Daredevil, Deadpool, Outlaw, Piledriver, Punisher, Spider-Man, Thunderball, Tombstone, Wrecker
ComicInfo.Locations: New York City, New York State
